price: Ó sọ pé: “Tí ó bá jẹ́ pé dájúdájú agbára kan wà fún mi lórí yín ni, tàbí (pé) mo lè darapọ̀ mọ́ ẹbí kan (tàbí ikọ̀ ọmọ-ogun kan) tó lágbára ni, (èmi ìbá di yín lọ́wọ́ níbi aburú yín).”
arabic: قَالَ لَوۡ أَنَّ لِي بِكُمۡ قُوَّةً أَوۡ ءَاوِيٓ إِلَىٰ رُكۡنٖ شَدِيدٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla law anna lī bikum quwwatan aw āwī ilā ruk'nin shadīdin
